entry.title: The Risk Developer Blog
entry.summary:
Risk Developer is a new website by Luke Makai, Associate Vice President handling risk management for the Americas division at SMBC, and Matt Makai, Developer Evangelist Manager - West Coast at Twilio.

We are focusing our writing on risk management from both finance and software development technical sides. Initially, most of our work will go into fleshing out the table of contents page before we handle specific step-by-step tutorials on this blog.

Let us know what you think on on Twitter @mattmakai or send us an email at matthew.makai@gmail.com.
